testcase.name: DBA.FR63
testcase.description: DBA.FR63: Error code FR63: The annual report contains items in the balance sheet (year's figures or comparison figures) which are greater than the balance sheet total. Assets and underlying accounting items must be less than or equal to the balance sheet total.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: Assets in Context ID-8 is smaller than AcquiredIntangibleAssets and Assets in Context ID-9 is smaller than NoncurrentAssets
